lead_paragraph: With Japan's World Cup chances hanging by a thread, coach Alberto Zaccheroni took a big gamble by dropping Shinji Kagawa — one of the team's two genuine international stars — from the starting lineup for a critical match against Greece.

headline.main: Japan Gamble to Drop Kagawa Bold and Unsuccessful
headline.print_headline: Japan Gamble to Drop Kagawa Bold and Unsuccessful

snippet: With Japan's World Cup chances hanging by a thread, coach Alberto Zaccheroni took a big gamble by dropping Shinji Kagawa — one of the team's two genuine international stars — from the starting lineup for a critical match against Greece...
